amendatorysection.para: The purpose of the Aging and Disability Resource Center Demonstration Project Act is to evaluate the feasibility of establishing aging and disability resource centers statewide to provide information about long-term care services and support available in the home and community for older Nebraskans or persons with disabilities, family caregivers, and persons who request information or assistance on behalf of others and to assist eligible individuals to access the most appropriate public and private resources to meet their long-term care needs.
